I like this take on Notion. I started using it in the early days 2018. Still a huge fan even though I prefer to keep my personal stuff in clean text.

Added an example 'personal knowledge encyclopedia' article for OAuth.  Hope to illustrate how useful a 'Wikipedia'-like approach can be for personal note taking.

Been exploring automated ways to pull from my bank accounts to Ledger format. Tiller and an export utility won out over 'ledger-autosync' due to its simplicity and use in spreadsheets as well. (See my personal finanace dashboard article for more info.
